study_plan_entry.title: The engineer in the industrial R&D

free_text.Learning outcomes: To make aware of the not technical aspects of work. To prepare oneself to the real context of the engineer-work.
free_text.Content: 1. Introduction, basic concepts[br/]2. Project Management[br/]3. Legal aspects[br/]4. Quality concepts[br/]5. Transfer of technology[br/]6. Financial aspects in technology

en.title: The engineer in the industrial R&D

free_text.Contenu: 1. Introduction, concepts de base[br/]2. Gestion des projets[br/]3. Eléments juridiques [br/]4. Concepts de qualité[br/]5. Les transferts de technologie[br/]6. Aspects financiers en technologie
free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: Sensibilisation aux aspects social et économique du travail d'ingénieur.
